ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: Unexpected character "}" in M2M relation
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Unexpected character "}" in M2M relation **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Go to Project Metadata 2. Click DB Metadata 3. Click Relations 4. if you have m2m relationship, you should see something like ``` # | Table Name (xx/xx) | Relation | Parent | Child | 1 | Table_A | HasMany | Table_A | _nc_m2m_Table_B_Table_A} 2 | _nc_m2m_Table_B_Table_A} | BelongsTo | Table B | _nc_m2m_Table_B_Table_A} ``` 5. Notice that for all ``relation.tn``, there is an unexpected characher ``}`` at the end. **Expected behavior** it should be ``_nc_m2m_Table_B_Table_A`` instead of ``_nc_m2m_Table_B_Table_A}`` Node: **v12.22.1** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **true** Database: **pg** ProjectOnRootDB: **false** RootDB: **pg** PackageVersion: **0.10.3**

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: Associative table name correction closes #349 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <61551451+pranavxc@users.noreply.github.com>
